summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2817, for the improvement of the east side of 29th Avenue and 29th Avenue North, from East Union Street to East John Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, together with wooden cross walks, providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 33798 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
